articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Pfizer to ask FDA to authorize booster as Delta variant spreads - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: US regulators say fully vaccinated people do not need additional jabs yet
articles.content: NEW YORK (Reuters) -- Pfizer plans to ask U.S. regulators to authorize a booster dose of its COVID-19 vaccine within the next month, the drugmaker's top scientist said on Thursday, based on evidence … [+4718 chars]

articles.title: Super Junior's Hee-chul and Twice's Momo break up - AsiaOne
articles.description: They were the first celeb couple to be announced in 2020 but K-pop's Momo Hirai and Kim Hee-chul are no longer together. The singers' management agencies responded to media queries today (July 8), after a South Korean news outlet ran a report quoting an anony…
articles.content:
